citeinfo.title: United States Three -Digit ZIP Code Areas, 2022

descript.abstract: U.S. ZIP Code Areas - Three-Digit represents the first three digits of a ZIP Code. The first digit of a five-digit ZIP Code divides the United States into 10 large groups of states (or equivalent areas) numbered from 0 in the Northeast to 9 in the far West. Within these areas, each state is divided into an average of 10 smaller geographical areas, identified by the second and third digits. These digits, in conjunction with the first digit, represent a Sectional Center Facility (SCF) or a mail processing facility area. These areas are serviced by the U.S. Post Office SCFs. Note that a single SCF often services multiple three-digit areas.
descript.purpose: U.S. ZIP Code Areas - Three-Digit provides ZIP Code (three-digit), population, and area for the three-digit ZIP Code areas in the United States.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States– Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local Esri Regional Office. For support, contact Esri by telephone (voice) between 5:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing +1-888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at +1-909-792-0960; or visit https://support.esri.com/; Esri holidays excluded. Email and chat are available through the Support page on My Esri (https://my.esri.com).
Outside the United States– Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local Esri Office. This information can be found at https://www.esri.com/en-us/contact#c=us&t=0. For other questions or comments, you may contact Esri headquarters by email, telephone, or fax or write to us.

dataqual.logic: The dataset is converted to file geodatabase (FGDB) format using tools in ArcGIS. The geometry is checked, and if needed repaired.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the dataset is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: Horizontal positional accuracy is dependent on geographic area. In most areas, accuracy is between 5 and 25 meters (16 and 82 feet). In some areas, accuracy is off by up to several tens of meters (100 feet or more). In the poorest areas, accuracy is off by up to 100 meters (328 feet).

serinfo.sername: TomTom® MultiNet® Post NAM; TomTom MultiNet North America

srcinfo.srccitea: TomTom MultiNet Post North America; TomTom MultiNet North America

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by Esri: Copied Data and Maps 2022 U.S. ZIP Code Areas and renamed it. Added the field ZIP3 and dissolved on the first three digits in the ZIP Code keeping the first STATE value found in the dissolve and summarizing the field SQMI. For ZIP3 values of "000" and "001", calculated STATE = "US" (U.S. federal lands). Summarized the field POPULATION (alias POP2021). Recalculated the field POP_SQMI (alias POP21_SQMI). Removed and reordered fields.

enttyp.enttypd: The polygons represent areas serviced by sectional center facilities or mail processing facilities in the United States.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The three-digit number used by the postal service to identify an area serviced by a sectional center facility or a mail processing facility.

codesetd.codesetn: USPS National 5-Digit ZIP Code™ and Post Office Directory

attr.attrdef: The two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory in which the ZIP Code area is located. A value of 'US' represents federal lands.

codesetd.codesetn: INCITS 38-2009, (Formerly FIPS 5-2) Codes for the Identification of the States and Equivalent Areas within the United States, Puerto Rico, and the Insular Areas

attr.attrdef: The 2021 population of the ZIP Code area.

attrdomv.udom: Populations for the features. A <Null> value means no data.

attr.attrdef: The 2021 population of the ZIP Code area per square mile.

attrdomv.udom: Calculated populations per square mile for the features. A <Null> value means no data.

attr.attrdef: The area of the ZIP Code polygon in square miles using the North America Albers Equal Area Conic projection.
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
